item.title: Plus One for Swietka
item.description: Swietka, a stunning woman in her early thirties with luscious blond locks, captivating curves, and an impeccable fashion sense, had always taken pride in her appearance.

item.title: Jen's Discovery
item.description: Hi All, this is my first ever glasses story… It’s a working progress and I invite you to join writing sections of it… I have written the first two scenes.
